item.title: Block Stock Pops as Jack Dorsey's Bitcoin, Payments Company Dumps 4,000 Jobs
item.description: Block said the restructuring will cost up to $500 million and be largely completed by mid-2026, as investors embraced the move.

item.title: Bitcoin futures, options market flash caution even as BTC chases $70K
item.description: Bitcoin bulls are chasing after $70,000 but cautious signals from the futures and derivatives market could explain why success remains elusive.

item.title: There‚Äôs a New DeFi Bill in Congress‚ÄîWhat Does That Mean for Crypto Market Structure?
item.description: Lawmakers introduced a bill Thursday protecting crypto software developers from criminal prosecution. Does that mean the crypto market structure bill is falling by the wayside?

item.title: U.S. regulator's GENIUS pitch casts dark cloud over crypto sector's stablecoin model
item.description: The U.S. Office of the Comptroller of the Currency proposed rules that would govern stablecoins, including apparent limits on rewards that may affect Coinbase.

item.description: Morgan Stanley wants to let clients custody and trade Bitcoin‚Äîand it's building the tech itself.

item.title: SEC approval sought for JitoSOL Solana-based liquid staking token ETF
item.description: The proposal would allow a US exchange to trade shares of a fund holding JitoSOL, representing the first SEC exchange filing for a liquid staking token ETP.

item.title: Grant Cardone plans to tokenize his firm's $5 billion real estate portfolio
item.description: The real estate investment mogul said his firm, Cardone Capital, is exploring blockchain-based tokens for property holdings as tokenization gains traction.
